resources.string: We were unable to fetch your data. Please try refreshing again by clicking below
We use your location information to identify, notify you about, and access services available near you like pharmacy partners and diagnostic centres while you are using the app

We require access so you can share images of prescription/medical reports with your Doctor. No photos will be posted publicly. The images/video access will be strictly restricted to you and your Doctor only

We require access so you can share images of prescription/medical reports with your Doctor. No photos will be posted publicly. The images/video/file access will be strictly restricted to you and your Doctor only
We use your calendar to store data in your mobile device calendar and provide timely reminders for upcoming events/fitness sessions/health appointments

We require access so you can share images of prescription/medical reports with your Doctor. No photos will be posted publicly. The images/video/file access will be strictly restricted to you and your Doctor only
Stay informed! To receive important updates, appointment reminders, and exclusive offers, please grant us permission to send push notifications.
ekincare require access to physical activity to track your steps
